document.full_text: a heavyweight rival to japanese prime minister naoto kan from his ruling party on friday publicly blasted the leader's handling of a nuclear crisis, as deepening rifts in the group threaten to stall policies after a march earthquake and tsunami.
document.title: japan pm rival widens ruling party rift over crisis
lines_and_colors: a heavyweight rival to japanese prime minister naoto kan from his ruling party on friday publicly blasted the leader's handling of a nuclear crisis, as deepening rifts in the group threaten to stall policies after a march earthquake and tsunami.
